titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House in the Senate amendment to H.R. 1299, with an amendment.

action.text: Mrs. Davis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 896.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/6/2009--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 1299 (United States Capitol Police Administrative Technical Corrections Act of 2009).
